src:
VANDA NARA NASTAVLJA DA PROVOCIRA: Navijači Intera osuli drvlje i kamenje na suprugu Maura Ikardija! [FOTO]
02 Nov 2019, 18:01 by Marko
Inter u subotu od 18.00 gostuje u Bolonji u okviru 11. kola Serije A.
„Neroazuri“, takođe, u utorak igraju protiv Dortmunda u Nemačkoj možda i najvažniji meč za prolaz u nokaut fazu Lige šampiona.
Ukoliko izgube, Borusija će imati tri boda prednosti dva kola pre kraja grupne faze najjačeg evropskog klupskog takmičenja.
Međutim, supruga i agent Maura Ikardija- Vanda Nara, još jednom je razbesnela navijače „neroazura“.
Naime, ona je u petak postavila na Instagram story“ slike svog sina u dresu ekipe sa kojom Inter bije odlučujuću bitku za prolaz u osminu finala Lige šampiona.
Usledili su prilično negativni komentari navijača kluba sa „Đuzepe Meace“, očigledno misleći da ona namerno provocira sve kojima je „crno-plava“ boja u srcu.




POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
VANDA NARA CONTINUES TO PROVOCATE: Inter fans blow woods and stones on Maura Icardi's wife! [PHOTO]
02 Nov 2019, 17:01 by Marko
Inter will visit Bologna on Saturday at 18.00 as part of the 11th round of Serie A.
The Neroazurs also play Tuesday against Dortmund in Germany, arguably the most important match for the Champions League knockout phase.
If they lose, Borussia will have three points advantage of two rounds before the end of the group stage of the strongest European club competition.
However, Maura Ikardi's wife and agent, Wanda Nara, once again infuriated the "neo-Azur" fans.
Specifically, she posted on Instagram story "pictures of her son in the jersey of the team with which Inter fought a decisive battle to advance to the eighth Champions League final.
There were some pretty negative comments from the club's Giuseppe Meace fans, apparently thinking that she was deliberately provoking everyone with a "black and blue" color in her heart.
